name: Maxxis Rekon Race 29in. TR Dual EXO Folding Tire
categories: Rekon Race 29in. TR Dual EXO Folding Tire
description: A fast rolling 29er tire that's designed for aggressive XC trails riding. Inspired by the Rekon, this race version has smaller, shorter knobs that equal speed on hard packed dirt.Dual compound provides excellent traction and stability.Tires are foldable and tubeless ready.EXO protected sidewalls prevent slashes without affecting ride quality.
